item.title: Shooting by ICE officer in Los Angeles wounds motorist, U.S. marshal
item.description: Federal authorities said the driver had threatened officers with a vehicle while trying to flee an arrest.

item.title: Vance seeks to bolster fragile Gaza ceasefire on trip to Israel
item.description: Vice President JD Vance traveled to Israel as the U.S. tries to show that it will enforce a Gaza ceasefire deal that is off to a shaky start.

item.title: Trump refugee plan seeks 7,000 Afrikaners — and virtually no one else
item.description: The Trump administration’s rush to process thousands of White South Africans as refugees coincides with plans for overall admissions set as low as 7,5...

item.title: Pardoned Jan. 6 rioter arrested over threat to kill Rep. Hakeem Jeffries
item.description: The House minority leader confirmed in a statement that he was the subject of a “credible death threat” from someone “with every intention to carry it...

item.title: Tracking who Trump is appointing to fill key administration roles
